<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Start domain verification"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/{realm}/orgs/{orgId}/domains/{domainName}/verify"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Initiate a verification check for the domain name owned by this organization

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"orgId","description":"organization id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"domainName","description":"domain name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"202":{"description":"success"}}}
>
